name: trackly
description: Trackly is a self-hosted service for tracking habits or metrics over time. It records entries and renders charts and summaries to help visualize personal progress.
features: Habit tracking: Record daily habits and metrics to build consistency and monitor progress over time.
Metric logging: Track quantifiable metrics like weight, mood, or custom measurements with flexible data types.
Chart visualization: View progress through charts and graphs that highlight trends and patterns.
Historical data: Access complete history of all tracked habits and metrics for long-term analysis.
Custom metrics: Define custom tracking categories that match your specific goals and interests.
Progress summaries: Review summaries showing completion rates, streaks, and overall progress.
Simple entry: Log data quickly with minimal friction using streamlined input forms.
Privacy-focused: Keep all personal tracking data on your own server with complete control.
Trend analysis: Identify patterns and correlations in your tracked data over time.
Goal setting: Set targets for habits or metrics and track progress toward achieving them.
Mobile-friendly: Log entries from mobile devices with a responsive interface.
Export data: Export tracking data for backup or analysis in external tools.
